title: Audible Student Discount Tips & Tricks to Save You Some Money

steps.title: Go to https://www.audible.com.
steps.content: Go to https://www.audible.com . While Audible doesn't have a student discount, they do offer an extended two-month free trial of Audible Premium Plus. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Sign in with your Amazon account.
steps.content: Sign in with your Amazon account. Make sure the account you sign in with has an Amazon Prime Student membership.

steps.title: Click Plans & Pricing.
steps.content: Click Plans & Pricing . It's near the top of the page, under the Audible logo.

steps.title: Click Start my free trial under Audible Premium Plus.
steps.content: Click Start my free trial under Audible Premium Plus. You can sign up for Audible Premium if you prefer, but you'll get a 30-day free trial instead of a two-month free trial.

steps.title: Click Try for $0.00.
steps.content: Click Try for $0.00 . Audible will automatically enter your payment method from your Amazon Prime account to pay for the membership after the free trial is over. Click Change to switch to a different Amazon payment method.

steps.title: Use Audible free for two months.
steps.content: Use Audible free for two months. If you sign up for a free trial and it says you only have a 30-day free trial, contact Audible support at https://www.audible.com/contactus . If you explain the situation, an Audible customer support agent can switch the trial for you. On the Audible contact page, click Membership , then select Plans & Benefits from the dropdown. Click Chat . A chat window with an automated chatbot will pop up. Explain the situation in a few words (i.e., "my membership" or "free trial"). Click Contact an agent and follow the on-screen instructions to get connected to an agent.

steps.title: Go to https://www.myunidays.com.
steps.content: Go to https://www.myunidays.com . UNiDAYS is a website that has exclusive deals for verified university students. Note: UNiDAYS does not currently have any Audible deals. These steps are included in the event UNiDAYS has an Audible discount in the future.

steps.title: Sign up for a free UNiDAYS account, or log in.
steps.content: Sign up for a free UNiDAYS account, or log in. If you're already signed up for UNiDAYS, log in now. Otherwise, sign up using these steps: Click the three-line menu in the upper-left corner. Click Join now . Enter your personal (not student) email and choose a password, agree to the UNiDAYS terms of service, and click Join now . Verify your account by entering your first and last name, gender, date of birth, school, and email when prompted. Click the link in the verification email sent to your student email to finish the verification process.

steps.title: Search for Audible.
steps.content: Search for Audible . If there are any deals, they will drop down from the search bar. UNiDAYS doesn't always have Audible offers, so if you don't see any, check back at a later time. As of October 2024, UNiDAYS does not have any Audible deals.

steps.title: Click Get now under the deal you want to claim.
steps.content: Click Get now under the deal you want to claim. The deal's webpage will go into detail about the terms of the deal, such as if this deal applies to new and/or existing customers.

steps.title: Click Activate discount.
steps.content: Click Activate discount . If the discount is automatic, you'll be brought to the Audible website to sign up for a new subscription. If the discount is a code, you will be provided a code to use when signing up for Audible.

steps.title: Go to https://www.studentbeans.com.
steps.content: Go to https://www.studentbeans.com . Like UNiDAYS, Student Beans is a website with exclusive deals for verified university students. Note: Student Beans does not currently have any Audible deals. These steps are included in the event Student Beans has an Audible discount in the future.

steps.title: Sign up for a free Student Beans account, or log in.
steps.content: Sign up for a free Student Beans account, or log in. If you're already signed up for Student Beans, log in now. Otherwise, sign up using these steps: Click Register in the upper-right corner. Enter your personal email (not your student one) and desired password and click Lets go! Enter your first and last name, pronouns, and birthdate, then click Continue . Set your email preferences. Enter the country your school is in, projected graduation date, and student email, then click Continue . If you don't have a student email, click Use a different method , then Upload proof . You'll need to upload an official document from your school to verify that you're a student. Click the link in the verification email sent to your student email to finish the verification process.

steps.title: Search for Audible and click the offer you want to claim.
steps.content: Search for Audible and click the offer you want to claim. The deal's webpage will go into detail about the terms of the deal, such as if this deal applies to new and/or existing customers. Student Beans doesn't always have Audible offers, so if you don't see any, check back at a later time. As of October 2024, Student Beans does not have any Audible deals.

steps.title: Click Sign up now.
steps.content: Click Sign up now . If the discount is automatic, you'll be brought to the Audible website to sign up for a new subscription. If the discount is a code, you will be provided a code to use when signing up for Audible.

steps.title: Libby.
steps.content: Libby. Libby is a free app that connects with your library card to offer free ebooks and audiobooks. All you need is a library card, which is free to get at your local library. You can use Libby on iPhone, Android, e-reader, and in your browser.

steps.title: Hoopla.
steps.content: Hoopla. Hoopla is similar to Libbyâ€”with your library card, you can borrow ebooks and audiobooks for free. They also offer music, comics, and much more. You can use Hoopla on iPhone, Android, certain e-readers, and in your browser.
